summary: In a remote and windswept valley somewhere in the rugged landscapes of Iceland, a solitary elderly couple prepares for the forthcoming winter; however, the urge to work in such a feverish haste remains unknown.
cast: Jón Sigurbjörnsson|Kristjana Vagnsdottir|Kjartan Bjargmundsson|Arnheiður Steinþórsdóttir|Ólafía Hrönn Jónsdóttir|Sigurður Skúlason
title: Síðasti bærinn
